answers.answer: This is my second week  into the diet and have already lost 5 pounds. In my opinion, I don't think we're going to be gaining a whole lot of weight.
I think that's pretty normal based on what I've heard
Yes its normal second time with GD and I've lost both times. As long as when they measure your fundamental height at your appointments and its measuring normal there is no concern

My first pregnacy I had GD I gained 82 pounds. I did everything right. But I was put on Steroids multiple times for my asthma. This pregnacy I only gained 8 since my asthma been in check.As long as your baby is growing and your keeping track of your numbers, you fine
I have the diabetes n it make me feeling down, im 29 weeks now, is it ok wif it? Im worried n i dont like to meet the dietician.
I was worried at first. You can eat a lot of what you did before just in smaller portions. Well except for sweets really.
I hacrr pregnancy diabeties .. I havr to use the machine to check mt blood 7 tyms a day n they will decide if a  need treat ment after two weeks of recordn nt blood sugars ... not fun :'( xx

question: Been on my gd diet for 4 weeks and haven't gained and weight? I'm 31 weeks. Is this normal?
title: gestational diabetes diet.
